title: Walmart's Black Friday Deals Launch Super Early This Year. Here's What's on Sale Right Now
text:
Walmart built its reputation on low prices — and it lives up to the hype every year with the rollout of the latest Black Friday deals. Last year at Walmart, Black Friday deals were strong in several categories, with big sales and major discounts on technology, media, toys, entertainment, kitchen appliances, and all manner of gifts.

Although we don’t yet have details on what the best Walmart Black Friday deals will be in 2019, it’s safe to say shoppers can expect to see similar discounts across a wide range of merchandise. And if you’re looking for pre-Black Friday deals at Walmart, you’re in luck — because the company has tons of online deals going live a full month before Black Friday. (When is Black Friday? It’s always the day after Thanksgiving. So it’s Friday, November 29, in 2019.)

Walmart always gets into the holiday shopping game early: Last year, the Walmart Black Friday ad made its debut on November 8, and although the absolute best deals didn’t drop until the day before Thanksgiving, it offered some pre-Black Friday deals (starting as early as November 1) that were almost as good as the real thing, like a Samsung Galaxy Tab tablet for $50 off and a 16-inch convertible HP laptop for $170 off the list price.

Courtesy of Walmart More

The “Black Friday” deals at Walmart start even earlier this year. Walmart just launched what the company is calling an “Early Deals Drop” on Friday, October 25, with online pre-Black Friday sales on TVs, home goods, toys, and a wide range of other gifts.

Here are some the Early Deals Drop items on sale at Walmart.com now, as of Friday, October 25:

Courtesy of Walmart More
description: Huge discounts on TVs, home goods, toys, and more.
